headline: Court Sides with Cardiovalve in Edwards patent spat
summary: Venus Medtech (Hangzhou) Inc. ("Venus Medtech", Stock Code: 02500.HK) recently announced a decisive legal victory for its wholly-owned subsidiary Cardiovalve Ltd. ("Cardiovalve") against Edwards Lifesciences Corporation and Edwards Lifesciences LLC. (collectively "Edwards"). The United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit ("CAFC") has formally issued its mandate in Case 23-1515, affirming the Patent Trial and Appeal Board's ("PTAB") December 2022 ruling that upheld the validity of Car
